name: Battle Maze 1940
description:
Game Idea: Top down Shootem up with  different types of tanks and some historic info in between levels so people can have an idea of what tanks were and the impact they had with also some clips of the tanks themselves from movies or documentaries

Gameplay: Each level you have to protect yourself and a base from being destroyed by the enemies. Each level has a Boss that needs to be defeded before you can progress to the next level until you reach the final battle. 

My first somewhat complete game took a bit of time not very good but i tried my best negative feedback welcome :)
